'''Farbal''' is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] in [[A Parade of Providence]]. He can be found below the [[Razan Garden]].

During this period, Farbal can be found under [[File:Icon Gathering of Stars.png|30x30px]] icon on the map.

==Event Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Before completing [[Opening Festivities]])
:'''Farbal:''' *sigh* Everyone's just too sensitive about academic issues. It's just a toy. Come on...
----
;(After completing [[Gathering of Stars]])
:'''Farbal:''' I wish the older students would stop coming over to ask. This really, truly is just a toy.
:'''Farbal:''' Ah? Oh... It's you, Traveler. Would you like to play a round or two of "Gathering of Stars"?
:{{DIcon|Gathering of Stars}} I'd like to give this a try.
::'''Farbal:''' Sure. The astrolabe is over here.
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now, sorry.
::'''Farbal:''' Well, I'll be here at the booth throughout the Gala. If you're of a mind to play, just hit me up.
{{Dialogue End}}
